item.title: Change appsettings.json without restart in app service plan
item.description: Nowadays, zero downtime is normal, you canâ€™t believe that in azure app service changes in "app settings", App Service triggers an app restart. The naive and obvious way is that changing appsettings.json files via entering the app services using kudo console.
